duties_responsibilities.duty: Prep, prepare, cook, and serve meals while recognizing special diets and dietary needs.
Maintain and operate food preparation equipment, report production shortages, and follow recipes and production guidelines.
Maintain inventory of food and supplies, ensure clean and organized work area, and assist with stock and groceries.
Partner with leaders to maintain awareness of facility events, accommodate resident requests, and demonstrate proper safety and sanitation techniques.
Support all employees within the community and perform other assigned duties.
